text: Chico Hamilton Trio Introducing Freddie Gambrell is an album by drummer and bandleader Chico Hamilton, released on the World Pacific label.Pacific Jazz Records Catalog: 1200 series accessed June 30, 2015Edwards, D., Eyries, P. and Callahan, M. Pacific Jazz/Pacifica Album Discography accessed June 30, 2015 ==Reception== AllMusic rated the album 2 stars.Allmusic listing accessed June 5, 2015 ==Track listing== # "Lullaby of the Leaves" (Bernice Petkere, Joe Young) - 5:45 # "Reservation Blues" (Freddie Gambrell) - 4:51 # "These Foolish Things" (Jack Strachey, Holt Marvell, Harry Link) - 4:07 # "Ex-Ray's Friends" (Gambrell) - 4:06 # "Devil's Demise" - 5:37 (Ben Tucker) # "You're the Cream in My Coffee" (Ray Henderson, Buddy DeSylva, Lew Brown) - 4:16 # "Midnight Sun" (Lionel Hampton, Sonny Burke, Johnny Mercer) - 4:40 # "Five Minutes More" (Jule Styne, Sammy Cahn) - 3:06 ==Personnel== *Chico Hamilton - drums *Freddie Gambrell - piano *Ben Tucker - bass == References == Category:World Pacific Records albums Category:Chico Hamilton albums Category:1958 albums
title: Chico Hamilton Trio Introducing Freddie Gambrell
